definition: the Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC/Xia of the Sixteen Kingdoms (407-432)/surname Xia

sentences.english: There is a woman at the door, inquiring for Mr. Sharp.
sentences.chinese: 门口有个女人求见夏普先生。

sentences.english: Sharp declined to say how many non-full-time staff members it employs.
sentences.chinese: 夏普拒绝透露非全职员工的规模。

sentences.english: His cab stopped again at the offices of Tolman & Sharp.
sentences.chinese: 托尔曼和夏普的办公室，他的驾驶室又停了下来。

sentences.english: His cab stopped again at the offices of Tolman & Sharp.
sentences.chinese: 他坐的出租车再次停在托尔曼和夏普律师事务所前。

sentences.english: The President designated Mr.Sharp as the next Secretary of State.
sentences.chinese: 总统任命夏普先生为下任国务卿。

sentences.english: Standing outside the high court, Sharp made a direct address to the US president.
sentences.chinese: 站在高等法院外，夏普直接向美国总统发出呼吁。

sentences.english: Here is Shep O'Neal with the final part of the story.
sentences.chinese: 这里是故事的最后一部分夏普奥尼尔。

sentences.english: Sharpless, guided by Goro, pays a visit to Butterfly .
sentences.chinese: 夏普勒斯在五郎的陪同下来找蝴蝶。

sentences.english: "I think the results are quite striking, " Sharpless says.
sentences.chinese: “我认为这一结果是相当惊人，”夏普勒斯说。

sentences.english: Here is Shep O'Neal with the first part of the story.
sentences.chinese: 这里是故事的第一部分，夏普奥尼尔。

sentences.english: "I think the results are quite striking," Sharpless says.
sentences.chinese: “我认为这一结果是相当惊人，”夏普勒斯说。

sentences.english: 'I should have killed him, ' Sharpe growled.

definition: three major stars of the Three Stars 參宿|参宿[Shen1 xiu4] Chinese constellation/the belt of Orion/three spirits 福[fu2], 祿|禄[lu4], and 壽|寿[shou4] associated with the Three Stars 參宿|参宿[Shen1 xiu4] Chinese constellation
Sanxing or Sanhsing township in Yilan county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], Taiwan/Samsung (South Korean electronics company)
Hon Hai Precision Industry Company, Taiwan technology company, aka Foxconn
Panasonic Corporation (formerly Matsushita Electric Industrial Co.)
